subScenes.name: 询问方向
subScenes.description: 向站务员询问去市中心的路线

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! How can I help you today?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您好！有什么可以帮您的吗？

responses.text: Hi! Could you tell me how to get to the city center?
responses.text_cn: 你好！能告诉我怎么去市中心吗？

responses.text: Excuse me, where's the way to downtown?
responses.text_cn: 不好意思，去市中心怎么走？

qaPairs.speakerText: Sure! Take Line 2 towards East Station, then switch to Line 5 at Central Plaza.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 当然！坐2号线往东站方向，在中央广场换5号线。

responses.text: Thanks! Is Line 5 going directly to the city center?
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！5号线直接到市中心吗？

responses.text: Got it. And how many stops?

subScenes.name: 确认换乘
subScenes.description: 确认换乘站和方向是否正确

qaPairs.speakerText: You need to change at Green Park. The train heads north from there.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您需要在绿园站换乘，之后列车往北开。

responses.text: Wait, is that the same platform or do I go upstairs?
responses.text_cn: 等等，是同站台换乘还是得上楼？

responses.text: North? I thought it went west...

qaPairs.speakerText: No, you’ll need to take the stairs to the next level. Look for the signs that say 'Line 5 - Northbound'.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 不，您得上楼梯到下一层，找标着‘5号线-北行’的指示牌。

responses.text: Okay, thanks! I’ll look for the signs.
responses.text_cn: 好的，谢谢！我会找指示牌。

responses.text: Got it! I won’t miss it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认指示信息并表达感谢

subScenes.name: 询问终点站
subScenes.description: 确认列车是否直达最终目的地

qaPairs.speakerText: This train goes all the way to Museum Station. Last stop!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这趟车直达博物馆站，是终点站。

responses.text: Is this the last stop? I don’t want to miss it.
responses.text_cn: 这是终点站吗？我怕坐过站。

responses.text: Great! Can I stay seated the whole time?
responses.text_cn: 太好了！我可以一路坐着不换吗？

qaPairs.speakerText: Yes, no transfers needed. Just stay on until you hear 'Museum Station, last stop'.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 是的，不用换乘，听到‘博物馆站，终点站’再下车。

responses.text: Perfect! Thanks so much for your help!
responses.text_cn: 太好了！非常感谢您的帮助！

responses.text: I’ll listen for that. You’re a lifesaver!
responses.text_cn: 我会注意听的，你真是帮了大忙！

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达感谢并确认听觉提示

qaPairs.speakerText: You're all set! Have a great day exploring the city!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 一切搞定啦！祝你在城市里玩得开心！

responses.text: Thank you so much! You’ve been really helpful!
responses.text_cn: 非常感谢！你太有帮助了！

responses.text: Thanks! I’ll find my way now.
